tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_insurance (
    policy_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
    coverage_details VARCHAR(255),
    expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE insurance_policy (
    policy_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_make VARCHAR(50),
    vehicle_model VARCHAR(50),
    coverage_details TEXT,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE driver_details (
    driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    driver_name VARCHAR(50),
    driver_license_number VARCHAR(20),
    driver_birthdate DATE,
    driver_address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE claim_history (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_number INT,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_number) REFERENCES insurance_policy(policy_number)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
  vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  make VARCHAR(100),
  model VARCHAR(100),
  year INT,
  vin_number VARCHAR(17)
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_policies (
  policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_number VARCHAR(20),
  coverage_details TEXT,
  policy_type VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE policy_holders (
  holder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE drivers (
  driver_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id UUID REFERENCES insurance_policies(policy_id),
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE accidents (
  accident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id UUID REFERENCES insurance_policies(policy_id),
  accident_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
